sentences.en: 'Dreamy eyes and unkempt hair, What have you done to yourself. "
sentences.cn: ‘ 朦胧的眼神,蓬乱的头发你对自己做了什么 ’

sentences.en: During the owners'absence the lawn became dreadfully unkempt.
sentences.cn: 主人们不在的时候,草地变得凌乱不堪.

sentences.en: He did not mean to go unkempt.
sentences.cn: 他并非存心要衣冠不整.

sentences.en: He had long unkempt hair and a stubbly chin.
sentences.cn: 他的头发又长又乱，脸上胡子拉碴。

sentences.en: His hair was unkempt and filthy.
His voice was hoarse and his unkempt head only added to its grewsome quality.
sentences.cn: 他的声音嘶哑,加上他那副蓬头垢面的样子,听起来很可怕.

sentences.en: No one knows what period this mass of unkempt grave mounds belongs to.
sentences.cn: 这片丛冢也不知是什么年代的.

sentences.en: She slopped about her room, unkempt and dishevelled, in her tawdry dressing - gown.
sentences.cn: 她不修边幅,满头蓬发,穿着俗里俗气的睡衣邋邋遢遢在屋里走来走去.

sentences.en: The brick path to the door was hemmed in on either side by tall, unkempt boxwood hedges.
sentences.cn: 通往门口的砖路两旁是高大、杂乱的黄杨树篱。

sentences.en: The old beggar was dirty and unkempt.
Their faces were unkempt, their clothing sloppy.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然仪容不整, 衣服也都是遢里邋遢的.

sentences.en: Unkempt occasionally allowed, but must on occasion.
sentences.cn: 允许偶尔蓬头垢面, 但要注重场合.

sentences.en: Visitors who caught sight of him in New Hampshire where he lived described an unkempt recluse.
sentences.cn: 曾有访客在其居住地新罕布希尔州见过他,把他描绘成一位不修边幅的隐士.

words.tran_cn: 蓬乱的，不整洁的；（言语等）粗野的

trans.tran_cn: （头发）蓬乱的，未加梳理的，（言语等）粗野的，邋遢，披头散发
trans.tran_en: unkempt hair or plants have not been cut and kept neat
